title: New Oluvil Harbour vested in the public
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana The newly constructed Oluvil commercial port and fisheries harbour together with the ice manufacturing plant constructed in the Eastern Province with aid from Denmark have been vested in the public by President Mahinda Rajapaksa this afternoon on 01 September. Sri Lankan Government in its plans to…
